transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji madam?
Executive: Haan ji good morning sir, A.S. Marketing se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Ji Anjali baat kar rahi hu aapne I think mujhe 15 ko sir call kiya tha to maine aapko aapke primary number se call back bhi kiya tha but somehow mujhe response nahi mila.
Customer: Primary number to daddy ke paas rehta hai na.
Executive: Oh acha to sir maine unhe call bhi kiya tha and I messaged him so he was like ki koi problem nahi hai. So aap bataiye sir aapne mujhe call kiya tha kya issue aa raha tha aapko?
Customer: Problem wo kya thi wo ye jo iski app hai IndiaMART ki hang chal rahi thi wo chal hi nahi rahi thi.
Executive: Sorry sir aapki voice break ho rahi hai aap mujhe thoda sa brief matlab thoda aaram se bol sakte hai?
Customer: Haan main kah raha hu jo iski app hai na IndiaMART ki?
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan hang chal rahi thi bahut, bahut slow chal rahi thi.
Executive: Achha app slow ho rahi thi?
Customer: Kareeb haan bahut slow ho gayi thi aadha kareeb 30 minute ke aas 30 minute tak aise hi rahi. Tab maine kaha kya problem aa rahi hai tab maine aapko phone kiya tha uske liye.
Executive: Actually I am sorry ki maine first number pe call kar diya aur maine mujhe
Customer: Haan ji maine lagbhag teen char baar call kiya tab unhone uthaya nahi.
Executive: Haan ji aapne mujhe do baar call kiya tha actually Saturday tha na Saturday Sunday off rehta hai hamara.
Customer: Saturday Saturday bhi rehta hai?
Executive: Ji sir Saturday Sunday dono din off rehta hai but maine try kiya tha but main maine nahi kar paya.
Customer: Saturday Saturday ka kab se rehne laga Saturday to
Executive: Ah nahi sir filhal IndiaMART ka Saturday off rehta hai but aapko agar koi concern hai to aap call kar sakte hai. Main surely ye cheez dekhungi ki main next time aapko zarur connect karu.
Customer: Haan to abhi aapka kaisa chal raha hai?
Customer: Ab to theek chal raha hai wo kareeb 30 minute 30-40 minute tak aise hi chalta raha tab main call kiya tha fir maine kaha fir apne aap hi theek ho gaya tha.
Executive: Achha ek second rukiye main uska solution aapko puchti hu otherwise ye to thoda sa software ka issue aa sakta hai like ya
Customer: Haan fir maine update dekha ki update to nahi aaya lekin ye update tha update bhi koi aisa wo nahi tha update.
Executive: Update ki wajah se ho sakta hai kabhi kabhi device ki wajah se.
Customer: Nahi ho rakha tha pehle hi wo kar dekh liya tha maine ho rakha tha wo update update hi tha.
Executive: To like abhi koi issue to nahi aa raha hai na?
Customer: Nahi abhi abhi to koi issue nahi hai.
Executive: Abhi to abhi
Executive: Okay actually isi ke liye connect karna tha aap ek second call pe rahiyega.

(silence)

Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji madam.
Executive: Haan ji sir actually aapne call kiya tha na to maine aapke primary number se connect kar payi thi mera ticket raise hua tha. So just wanted to check ki apart from that ki jo aapka software mein issue aa raha tha uske alawa aapko koi aur concern to nahi hai? Like buyleads ka koi issue aa raha ho ya kisi aur cheez mein abhi koi issue aa raha ho?
Customer: Nahi bas wahi tha usi ke liye maine aapko call kiya tha baki to theek chal raha hai.
Executive: Okay like aisa hai na ki aapka call aaya tha main safar mein thi to then maine aapko contact back kiya tha maine whatsapp bhi kiya.
Customer: Haan nahi mujhe bhi nahi pata tha ki Saturday off rehta hai.
Executive: Mujhe bhi nahi pata tha Saturday off rehta hai mujhe
Customer: Balki Saturday mein to pehle jo the unse baat ho jati thi meri pehle unhone bhi ye bataya ki Saturday off aur Sunday ka hi pata tha mere ko bhi.
Executive: Achha koi baat nahi sir wo ho jata hai main try karungi.
Customer: Are nahi nahi koi issue nahi hai aap kar sakte hai aapko koi genuine problem hai aap kar sakte hai aapka problem genuine tha aapne kiya wo well and good hai but main maine number nahi actually main check kar payi. To maine sir ko call kiya tha and sir ne kaha ji nahi hame koi problem nahi hai to I was like wo to shayad galti se lag gaya ho.
Customer: App app main hi dekhta hu na isko daddy nahi dekhta isko na.
Executive: To sir aur to koi issue nahi aa raha na buyleads wagera mein ya
Customer: Nahi baki to baki to theek hi chal raha hai filhal to.
Executive: Filhal buyleads chal raha hai to sir baki matlab kaisa aapka overall reh raha hai aap satisfied hai na service se?
Customer: Nahi koi naye customer thodi hai madam hum hum to bahut purane customer hai IndiaMART ke.
Executive: Purane customer hai sir aapko abhi bhi nayi leads nahi aa rahi hai maine us din aapka portal check kiya tha then maine kuch arrangements bhi usme kare the to like aapko fir kuch bulk mein aur ye sab aana start nahi hua abhi tak?
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Maine aapke portal pe thode se changes kare the to like abhi tak aapko leads sab kuch relevant aana start hua?
Customer: Kya kya kya changes kiya?
Executive: Like maine filters wagera mein dekha tha aapne kaha tha bulk leads nahi aa rahe hai to maine wahi sab check kiya to fir ab to aa rahe honge na aapko?
Customer: Nahi lead to theek aa rahi hai lead mein to koi problem nahi hai ek call bhi aayi thi mere ko iske liye parso ek call bhi aayi thi.
Customer: Haan na call ki samasya thi lekin ek call aayi thi call ki batai thi maine aapko call income aa rahi hai.
Executive: Sir wo calls ka to main aapko seedha seedha batau wo same process wahi hai ki agar aap jitni calls receive kari hai aap jitna aapka miss call jitna kam hoga utna zyada software aapko calls dikhega but agar koi cheez ek baar miss ho ja rahi hai to fir samne wala ye understand kar leta hai apne aap se assume kar leta hai ki aap call nahi utha rahe hai to fir wo aapko call nahi karega.
Customer: Nahi call miss call to miss nahi hoti rehna agar koi by chance call miss ho bhi gayi to hum call back kar dete hai na usko wo to aa jata hai uska number to aa jata hai usme.
Customer: Buylead mein to agar maan le koi call miss ho gayi to wo to number to uska aa hi jata hai na hamare paas buylead mein.
Executive: Haan to call back kar dete hai.
Executive: But miss na aate aapke do product ka low score hai.
Customer: Kya hai?
Executive: Ye rotary rack oven 84 tray wala aur ek hai single bread slicer machine dono ka score 50-50 hai aapne inme
Customer: Score matlab kya?
Executive: Score matlab jo aapka catalog hota hai na catalog haan to us wala panel pe jab aap buyleads sorry products mein jaate hai fir waha pe upar hi show hota hai matlab aapka jo product hota hai waha aapke do products mein low score show ho raha hai 50-50 kar jaise 100 mein se 50 show ho raha hai aapne name sahi dala hai photo nahi to unki detail detail nahi bhar rakhi kya humne?
Executive: Haan detail nahi bhar rakhi aapne isme ek specification nahi bhar rakha hai do photo nahi dal rakhe hai bas sirf front ka photo aur side ka photo nahi dal rakhe hai.
Customer: Achha ek isme tha ek 90 liter ka hydraulic planetary mixer tha uska photo pehle jo sir the unse bhi kafi meri bare mein discuss hui thi wo photo nahi lag pa raha uska lagate hai to jaise kuch der baad fir hat jata hai.
Customer: Dekho aap check karna isme catalog mujhe laptop on karna padega nahi isme hydraulic planetary mixer hai 90 liter ya 80 liter hoga ya 90 liter.
Executive: Main check karti hu main ek second rukiye.
Customer: Ek baar uska photo mil nahi pa raha tha ya lag nahi pa raha tha?
Customer: Photo to lag jata hai par wo hat jata hai apne aap.
Executive: Achha hat jata hai apne aap haan apne aap hi product product ka mujhe thoda fir se pura naam batao samajh nahi aa paya uska naam.
Customer: Planetary mixer hoga planetary mixer.
Executive: P L A N P L A N E T 10 liter 10 liter planetary mixer imported ye 29
Customer: Imported nahi hoga imported nahi hoga.
Executive: Achha 80 liter ya 90 liter 80-90 liter ke aas paas hai.
Executive: Product hi nahi dikh raha hai inactive to nahi hai?
Executive: Sir ye wala inactive hai ye wo deactivate bhi to nahi ho raha wo deactivate to nahi ho gaya dekhna kya ho gaya uska kai baar wo
Executive: Deactivate isme to aapka ek bakery oven 18500 wala inactive mein aapke do products hai ek ye single planetary mix 80 liter missing wala ye aapka inactive hai.
Customer: Haan haan haan haan yahi ispe ispe image dikha rahi hai uspe?
Executive: Nahi image nahi dikha rahi hai.
Customer: Haan to wahi hai aapne try kiya tha isme image lagane ka?
Customer: Uspe to kai baar try kar liya lag hi nahi pata lag jata hai fir hat jata hai.
Executive: Don't worry sir ek baar main photo aapko bheju main bheju aapko?
Executive: Haan agar aapke paas image hai aap mujhe bhej dijiye agar image hai iski image hai
Executive: I think kuch specification miss kar rahe honge koi baat nahi ye ek image hai ye ek main try karti hu apni side se aapke paas hai to aap mujhe bhej do.
Customer: Haan main bhej deta hu.
Executive: Agar koi aur issue hota hai na to aap mujhe kabhi bhi connect kar lijiyega main next time surely aapko. Achha ye number number wahi hai aapka ye wala hai pehle kya tha?
Executive: Haan ji yahi wala hai haan ji yahi wala hai aap isi pe mujhe
Executive: Ah kaunsa sir?
Customer: Jisme maine call kiya tha.
Executive: Haan yahi number hai but aap mujhe agar aapko kuch haan yahi hai aap mujhe whatsapp pe kahi bhi aap mujhe connect kar sakte hai koi issue nahi hai.
Customer: Wo to number shayad mere mein save kar rakha hai save save hai wo.
Executive: Isi number pe connect kar lijiyega aap mujhe photo bhej dijiye otherwise maine kuch

(Call End)
summary:
Concerns:

- IndiaMART app was hanging and slow.

- Inactive product listing: Planetary mix 80 liter.

- Unable to upload image for hydraulic planetary mixer.

- Two products have a low score.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the app issue.

- Executive checked the customer's portal.

- Executive identified the inactive product listing.

- Executive offered to help with image upload.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send the image of the mixer.

- Executive will try to upload the image.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- app, inactive product, image upload, leads, catalog
